body:
Hi Mark,


I'm not quite sure what to suggest about the core dump -- I found out 
on another project that Cygwin isn't all that good with memory use.


As for mkillum creating extra *.dat files, you need to set the f= 
option as explained in the man page to avoid this behavior.


	http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/man_html/mkillum.1.html


-Greg
___
